729489f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Van Street
729489f-a.text:
1554 and 1550 Richmond Terrace, south side, east of Van Street. No. l554, the 2 1/2-story frame house, belonged
to C.M. Pine in 1874 (Beers's map).

July 5, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729489f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Van Street, Staten Island, NY

729490f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Van Street
729490f-a.text:
1580 Richmond Terrace, at the S.W. corner of Van Street, showing the office of C.W. Hunt Co., Inc. His house was the home of Mrs. Minott in 1874, and of Dr. Robinson
in 1898.

July 5, 1932
P.L. Sperr
729490f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Van Street, Staten Island, NY
